subject: Received Pedals with No Haptics
description_text:
Hello,

I ordered the "Newest Simsonn Plus X Simracing Load Cell Pedal with Haptics
Reactor" and I received the pedals today but it did not come with the VAM
pro Haptic feedback motors or the power supply. I am still waiting on
another package that has the hs pro shifter I ordered, are the VAM pro
motors and power supply coming along with that package? My order number is
SSN5064.

Thank you,

Matt

conversations.body_text: Hi Matthew Cerda,  Most likely, the pedals were shipped from our U.S. warehouse, while the VAM Pro motors were shipped from China, so they were sent in separate packages.

Hi Matthew Cerda,    We apologize for the inconvenience. The haptics have been out of stock for nearly two weeks—this item is incredibly popular. We'll ship yours within the next couple of days. We sincerely apologize for the delay.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047195320409,SF6047209786370

No problem, thank you for the update!

On Sun, Jan 4, 2026 at 2:18 AM service@simsonn.com
